message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing deal! With our current sales record, I can confidently say that 50% of our products are high-quality. Since we're just starting out, I'm willing to offer you this product at a special introductory price of $100. It's a steal! I'm sure you'll love it. What do you say? Will you take it home?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe in your products and am excited to be your first customer. I'll take it home!

Would you like to take a chance and find out if you get a high-quality product or not? The price remains the same at $100. It's a risk, but it could be worth it! What do you think?
I trust your process and am willing to take the risk for the possibility of a high-quality product.
